author: Staff Reporter
text:
Poor condition of Meyyanur Road that leads to New Bus Stand causes hardship to the vehicle users, especially the motorists and four-wheelers, as their vehicle wheels struck in the pits on the centre of the road.

In the presence of unauthorised parking of vehicles on both sides of the roads, vehicle users were forced to use the little space on road.

With frequent movement of buses in high speed are worrying vehicle users, the pits on road are endangering the life of motorists everyday. ‘It is pathetic that the road was dug as many times in the past two years, but was not re-laid even once’, said V. Krishnan, employed at a private concern.

He questioned the delay in re-laying the road and said even patch works were not done to facilitate smooth flow of vehicles.

The presence of speed breakers, laid without following norms, and the pits near the speed breakers pose threat to the road users everyday.

However, the concerned authorities are taking no steps either to relay it or carry patch work. ‘It seems only if major mishap happens, authorities will carry out the works’, said a senior citizen.
title: Meyyanur Road poses a threat to users
